sentences.en: A bunch of keys hung from his belt.
sentences.cn: 他的皮带上挂着一串钥匙。

sentences.en: Check your answers in the key at the back of the book.
sentences.cn: 用书后的解答核对答案。

sentences.en: China’s support is key to the success of the coalition.
sentences.cn: 中国的支持是联盟成功的关键。

sentences.en: Enriched uranium is a key component of a nuclear weapon.
sentences.cn: 浓缩铀是核武器的关键组成部分。

sentences.en: Give me the trunk key and I'll get the spare.
sentences.cn: 把行李箱的钥匙给我,我去拿一下备胎.

sentences.en: He has been criticized for flip-flopping on several key issues.
sentences.cn: 他因为在几个关键问题上临场变卦而备受批评。

sentences.en: He is expected to be the key witness at the trial.
sentences.cn: 他将成为审判的关键证人。

sentences.en: He started with a good holiday in Key West, Florida.
sentences.cn: 他先去佛罗里达的基韦斯特岛度了个愉快的假期。

sentences.en: Just hit the F5 function key to send and receive your e-mails.
sentences.cn: 只要按功能键F5就可以收发电子邮件了。

sentences.en: Key burbled about the wonderful people who contribute to tourism.
sentences.cn: 基喋喋不休地谈论着那些对旅游业作出贡献的了不起的人物。

sentences.en: List the key headings and sort them into a logical order.
sentences.cn: 列出关键标题并按逻辑顺序排列。

sentences.en: Moe was having fun banging the drums and singing off-key.
sentences.cn: 莫自得其乐地一边敲着鼓，一边不成调地唱着歌。

sentences.en: Press the ‘Escape’ key to exit.
sentences.cn: 按退出键退出。

sentences.en: That key will come in handy if you lock yourself out.
sentences.cn: 要是你把自己锁在了屋外，那把钥匙就派上用场了。

sentences.en: The key issue was whether the four defendants acted dishonestly.
sentences.cn: 关键问题是4名被告是否存在欺诈行为。

sentences.en: The key to his success is his logical mind.
sentences.cn: 他成功的关键在于他擅长逻辑思维。

sentences.en: The key to success is to be ready from the start.
sentences.cn: 成功的关键在于从一开始就要准备充分。

sentences.en: The negotiations have got stuck on a number of key issues.
sentences.cn: 谈判在一些重大问题上陷入了僵局。

sentences.en: The President makes all the key decisions on foreign policy.
sentences.cn: 外交政策上的所有重要决定都由总统作出。

sentences.en: They put the key in the door and entered.
sentences.cn: 他们用钥匙开了门然后走了进去。

sentences.en: this vaguely uplifting conclusion is out of key with the body of his book.
sentences.cn: 这个令人糊里糊涂地振奋的结论与该书的主体不协调。

sentences.en: this vaguely uplifting conclusion is out of key with the body of his book.
sentences.cn: 这个令人糊里糊涂地振奋的结论与该书的主体不协调。

sentences.en: You will find a key at the front of the book.
sentences.cn: 你会在书的前面找到略语表。

words.tran_cn: 无键的；（钟表等）以转柄上发条的
用键盘进行操作；作键盘式排字机排字
键入；用键盘式排字机排字
键入；锁上；调节…的音调；提供线索

phrases.tran_cn: 关键区，关键地区；标题区
主要组成部份；关键组分
关键部位，要害部位；位置关键帧
重点项目，关键项目；枢纽工程
（尤指在重要事件前）使紧张，使兴奋
私人密钥，个人密钥（用于把即将发送的消息进行加密的密钥）

trans.tran_cn: 钥匙，（打字机等的）键，关键，线索，秘诀，（音乐的）调
trans.tran_en: a small specially shaped piece of metal that you put into a lock and turn in order to lock or unlock a door, start a car etc
A key is a specially shaped piece of metal that you place in a lock and turn in order to open or lock a door, or to start or stop the engine of a vehicle

trans.tran_cn: 键入；锁上；调节…的音调；提供线索
键入，锁上，调节…的音调，提供线索
trans.tran_en: if you key a win for your team, you help it win a game because you play very well
